subtitle: frequently asked questions
first-question-body: redxam makes a quarter of the interest earned. Instead of having a fixed pricing, we strive to provide the best returns for our customers.
first-question-keyword: income earning profit cash dividends yeilds
second-question-title: How do the portfolios generate interest lending assets?
second-question-body: Our portfolios, including our conservative plan, lend the money through a secure collateral-based system to borrowers that pay interest for the assets.
second-question-keyword: scheme idea system method create make produce
third-question-body: We use bank-level security combined with impenetrable Bitcoin and Ethereum blockchain technologies, which provides one of the most secured financial networks in the world.
third-question-keyword: assured reliable dependable secured stable solid established
fourth-question-body: We donâ€™t require verification as long as you use cryptocurrencies for your savings account. Stablecoins are the recommended way of depositing assets.
fourth-question-keyword: biometric authentication identification verify substantiate prove demonstrate evidence
fifth-question-title: How much do you need to invest with redxam?
fifth-question-body: We recommend to deposit at least the value of 0.1BTC as this will function as a cushion for any market volatility and transfer fees. We estimate about $20 to $30 on fees so we bundle transactions to reduce the costs to virtually $0.
